q0.question: Undercover who spent the last seven years?
q0.recall: I'm sorry, but your statement is incomplete and does not make sense. Can you please provide more information or clarify your statement?
q0.vectordb: Special agent Nick spent the last seven years undercover in the heart of Asia's lucrative crime trade as a protégé to "Banker." He has been infiltrating the underworld industry for eight years and has amassed enough evidence to indict Banker. However, he has been ordered to remain undercover and expose the identity of the man behind Banker in order to bring down the entire organization. As Nick becomes more involved with Banker's crime family, he becomes corrupted by the easy money and power. He is unable to separate himself from his undercover persona and immerses himself into his role as a crime figure. Nick grapples with dangerous choices and finds himself flirting with more than just the devil. Protégé explores the complex relationships and loyalties within international crime syndicates.
